actions.description: 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Knife

conditionImmunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
name: Flying Staff

specialTraits.description: The staff is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the staff must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.
specialTraits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility

specialTraits.description: While the staff remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal staff.
specialTraits.name: False Appearance
